thread.title: Don't need to prove my patriotism to anybody, says Naseeruddin Shah
thread.title_full: Don't need to prove my patriotism to anybody, says Naseeruddin Shah - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Don't need to prove my patriotism to anybody, says Naseeruddin Shah
text: The 66-year-old actor said he was left "dejected" with the way the incident was reported as the "pertinent points" raised by other intellectuals who were present at the event was ignored but what he said was picked on and "misstatements" were made. Â»
